title: Players should be able to choose their role *before* they queue
body: Is anyone else tired of being forced to play roles they don't want to? Cuz I'd be willing to wait an extra few minutes in the queue to ensure that I could play the game how I want to play it. In any case, there would be no harm in including role select as an *option*, so if you don't want to wait the extra time, you can choose "any" as your role.

>
> There is a way

Only through draft pick, but that makes things *way* too complicated, and in any case isn't available until you have twenty champs.
way too complicated? Its almost exactly what youre asking for here. You pick two roles and que, what exactly is so complicated about that?

Pick order > call order. Good luck getting role you want -_- Thats how it were not so long ago. 
Damn Riot really spoiled you people super hard.

I have not seen "mid or feed" in 4 years, such a big improvement over the old trash fire of bratty children who dont understand networking having meltdowns over call order.

Nothing like going into a game with 80% of your team already having a tantrum and threatening to int.
I remember that. And only 3 bans too. gives me ptsd still when someone goes"lane or feed' in champ select now

I actually loved it. Good chances for enemies to have good infight even before game starts ^^
And since i was fine with playing support i had less chances for this to happen on my own team.
I still want team builder to return.

It's nowhere near as straightforward. You have to choose champions one by one in a set order, then you have to pick ban lists, trades, etc. I just want a normal blind pick mode where you can choose the role to play.

5 downvotes already. While downvotes are always to be expected in this community of bitter and spiteful virgins, I'd love to hear what reason anyone can offer for not wanting the *option* to select your role before queuing.
